title: Localization Revisited
summary: Is your web app ready for a global audience? Internationalizing your codebase with gettext (bit.ly/pyconi18n) might just be the simpler part of the puzzle. It's hard to maintain translations in a fast paced deployment environment without constant manual intervention. This talk covers tools and strategies you can adopt to automate your localization process and ensure high translation coverage.
